The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 09 April is 41,492 (4,802.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 April, there were 127 new confirmed cases (14.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 March, there were 211 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 40% (84 fewer cases).
